issue.title: Should SendToBaseStation() return false in case of delivery failure?

content.raw: Can you update the SubT API page to include information about how we interact with the acknowledgements through the comms client? Are we still using the SendTo function with the base station address to report artifacts or do we have to use the JSON-based API in the STIX ICD now?
content.html: Can you update the SubT API page to include information about how we interact with the acknowledgements through the comms client? Are we still using the SendTo function with the base station address to report artifacts or do we have to use the JSON-based API in the STIX ICD now?
